content.rendered:
Don’t Miss Our 2016 Calendar Deal!

Don’t miss the last week of our special offer on 2016 calendars! Only $7.00 each or $5.00 with any purchase.

Star Wars Novels Available at All Locations

Can’t get enough of Star Wars? Immerse yourself in this ever-expanding fictional universe with our selection of Star Wars novels. Just look for our Star Wars display at every Gottwals Books store!

We sell new books, too! Check out the New Stock displays for new releases and trending titles.

Shop Local in 2016!

What is your resolution for 2016? We have just about any book to meet your goals including health & diet, relationships, and devotionals. Or maybe you just want to read more books in 2016?! We can help you there as well-with our constantly expanding inventory, the possibilities are endless!

excerpt.rendered: Don’t miss the last week of our special offer on 2016 calendars! Only $7.00 each or $5.00 with any purchase.
